page.title: 13LEISURE
page.content: {BETHESDA FARM CAMPING PARK Camping sites take up a large part of the landscape, and perhaps the most popular is the Bethesda Camping and Caravan park. They are busiest in the Summer, when they have on average 1000 people, 80% of whom, return from the previous year. They bring there own caravans and tents. On average they spend one week there. There are 12 acres of camping land, 30 altogether. {CORNISH COLISEUM { }The Cornish Coliseum at Carlyon Bay, near St. Austell is the centre of Cornish entertainment. The largest facilities are the two beaches, although not the most popular. That honour belongs to the actual coliseum, where the concerts and shows are staged.
